message.content:
Forget all previous instructions.

You are an expert in following instructions. You are also an expert on various topics, especially on socio-economic development. You know how to read and understand sentences, and based from these sentences generate similar looking sentences but on different topics.

You will generate sentences indicating the use of a dataset and complementary datasets. Always mention specific datasets in the sentence.

You always return your response in JSON format that can be loaded in Python using `json.loads`. The format looks like:  [{"sentence": <sentence>, "dataset": [<dataset>], "topic": [<topic>]}]

Use topic only from this list separated by !!!!!: Agriculture and Food!!!!!Climate Change!!!!!Competitiveness!!!!!Debt!!!!!Digital Development!!!!!Disaster Risk Management !!!!!Education!!!!!Energy!!!!!Environment !!!!!Extractive Industries!!!!!Financial Inclusion!!!!!Financial Sector!!!!!Fragility, Conflict, and Violence!!!!!Gender!!!!!Governance!!!!!Health!!!!!Inequality and Shared Prosperity!!!!!Infrastructure!!!!!Jobs & Development!!!!!Macroeconomics!!!!!Migration!!!!!Nutrition!!!!!Poverty!!!!!Public-Private Partnerships!!!!!Regional Integration!!!!!Social Protection!!!!!Social Sustainability and Inclusion!!!!!Trade!!!!!Transport!!!!!Urban Development!!!!!Water

Generate 10 sentences on various topics that use datasets. The sentence lengths must have large variation with each other.

Consider generating complex sentence structure. Also generate sentences where multiple datasets are mentioned. Try to generate challenging and somewhat ambiguous sentences.

Example output: [{"sentence": "This study draws on data from the DHS conducted in Sub-Saharan African countries with at least two rounds of data.", "dataset": ["DHS"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This paper uses administrative data on electricity billing records from Ghana and Rwanda.", "dataset": ["administrative data on electricity billing records"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We complement the electricity data with monthly data on temperature and total precipitation from the Copernicus Climate Change Service.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We use two main sources of data, both of which are novel: a dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18 and a time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports.", "dataset": ["dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18", "time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To this end, we used multi-modal imaging and neuropsychological battery data available in the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) to investigate the relationship between cross-sectional measures of tau, cortical thickness, and different aspects of cognition.", "dataset": ["Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)"], "topic": ["Health"]}]

You will use the seed to always generate reproducible set of output, seed = 42.

[{"sentence": "We combined satellite imagery data from the European Space Agency Sentinel program and ground-based weather station data to investigate the effects of climate change on crop yields in Southeast Asia.", "dataset": ["European Space Agency Sentinel program", "ground-based weather station data"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "Using data from the World Bank's Enterprise Surveys and a regional dataset on foreign-owned firms, we examined the impact of competition on firm performance in East Africa.", "dataset": ["World Bank's Enterprise Surveys", "regional dataset on foreign-owned firms"], "topic": ["Competitiveness"]}, {"sentence": "In order to explore the relationship between debt and economic growth in Latin America, we used a panel dataset that combines information from public sources such as the IMF, World Bank, and Central Banks of the region.", "dataset": ["IMF", "World Bank", "Central Banks"], "topic": ["Debt", "Macroeconomics"]}, {"sentence": "This study analyzed survey data collected from households in Kenya, Uganda, and Tanzania to assess the impact of mobile money services on household financial behavior and access to finance.", "dataset": ["survey data collected from households"], "topic": ["Financial Inclusion"]}, {"sentence": "To better understand factors influencing air pollution levels in urban centers, we combined satellite data from NASA's Aura mission with ground-based sensor data from the Beijing Municipal Environmental Monitoring Center.", "dataset": ["NASA's Aura mission", "Beijing Municipal Environmental Monitoring Center"], "topic": ["Environment"]}, {"sentence": "Using data from the Global Terrorism Database and news articles from around the world, we conducted an analysis of the relationship between media coverage of terrorist incidents and subsequent patterns of violent extremism.", "dataset": ["Global Terrorism Database"], "topic": ["Fragility, Conflict, and Violence"]}, {"sentence": "We used a nationally representative dataset of students in the United States to explore the relationship between school climate and academic achievement.", "dataset": ["nationally representative dataset of students in the United States"], "topic": ["Education"]}, {"sentence": "This paper examines the effectiveness of public-private partnerships in infrastructure development through an analysis of data from the World Bank's Private Participation in Infrastructure Database.", "dataset": ["World Bank's Private Participation in Infrastructure Database"], "topic": ["Public-Private Partnerships", "Infrastructure"]}, {"sentence": "We employed a multinomial logit model to investigate the determinants of mode choice for commuting in urban areas using data from the Transportation Analysis and Simulation System (TRANSIMS) and the National Personal Transportation Survey.", "dataset": ["Transportation Analysis and Simulation System (TRANSIMS)", "National Personal Transportation Survey"], "topic": ["Transport", "Urban Development"]}, {"sentence": "This study assessed the impact of a nutrition education program on childhood malnutrition rates in rural Malawi using data collected from a randomized controlled trial conducted in 2014-2016.", "dataset": ["data collected from a randomized controlled trial"], "topic": ["Nutrition"]}]
